name: ThePathRadioMix
0:
”Alexa, play path radio mix”
”Alexa, open path radio mix”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: path radio mix
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Path Radio Mix is a licensed and free online music radio station. It self references as the "BIGGEST little internet radio experience" because of the large volume of music and audio library it streams around the clock. In addition to music, you may also hear stories and music interviews. After activating the skill, you can simply say, "Alexa, play path radio mix" to start streaming the audio content.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
